s0001: Ru Zhonglian was a man of Qi.
s0002: He delighted in strange, extraordinary, and unconventional strategies, but refused to take office or hold position, preferring to maintain lofty principles.
s0004: During Zhao King Xiaocheng's time, Qin king sent Bai Qi to break Zhao's Changping army, forty plus ten thousand before and after, Qin troops then east besieged Handan.
s0005: Zhao king feared, feudal lords' rescue troops none dared attack Qin army.
s0006: Wei King Anli sent general Xin Bi rescue Zhao, feared Qin, stopped at Dangyin not advancing.
s0007: Wei king sent guest general Xin Yuanjian enter Handan secretly, through Lord Pingyuan told Zhao king: 'Qin does this urgently besieging Zhao, previously with Qi Min Wang contended for supremacy to become emperor, afterward again returned emperor title;
s0008: Now Qi Min Wang already increasingly weak, presently only Qin heroic in world, this not necessarily greedy Handan, its intent wishes again seek to become emperor.
s0009: Zhao truly sends envoy honor Qin Zhao Wang as emperor, Qin must pleased, withdraw troops depart.'
s0010: Lord Pingyuan hesitated not yet decided.
s0011: At this time Ru Zhonglian just traveled Zhao, met Qin besieging Zhao, heard Wei will want make Zhao honor Qin as emperor, then saw Lord Pingyuan said: 'Affair will handle how?'
s0012: Lord Pingyuan said: 'Sheng how dare speak affairs!
s0013: Before lost forty thousand multitudes outside, now again inner besieging Handan cannot depart.
s0014: Wei king sent guest general Xin Yuanjian make Zhao emperor Qin, now that person is here.
s0016: Ru Zhonglian said: 'I began considering lord world worthy noble son, now then I know lord not world worthy noble son.
s0018: I request for lord blame and return him.'
s0019: Lord Pingyuan said: 'Sheng request introduce see mister.'
s0020: Lord Pingyuan then saw Xin Yuanjian said: 'East state has Ru Zhonglian mister, now that person here, Sheng request introduce, make him befriend general.'
s0021: Xin Yuanjian said: 'I heard Ru Zhonglian mister, Qi state's lofty scholar.
s0022: Yuanjian subject minister, mission has duty, I not wish see Ru Zhonglian mister.'
s0023: Lord Pingyuan said: 'Sheng already revealed it.'
s0025: Ru Zhonglian saw Xin Yuanjian without words.
s0026: Xin Yuanjian said: 'I see dwell this besieged city middle, all have requests of Lord Pingyuan;
s0027: Now I observe mister jade appearance, not one with requests of Lord Pingyuan. Why stay long this besieged city middle without depart?'
s0028: Ru Zhonglian said: 'World considers Bao Jiao no followers eulogy died, all not so.
s0029: Crowd people not know, then for one body.
s0030: That Qin, abandons ritual righteousness above merit country, authority makes its scholars, captive makes its people.
s0031: If immediately arrogantly becomes emperor, passes to govern world, then Zhonglian has step East Sea die, I not bear be its people.
s0032: What for see general, wishes assist Zhao.'
s0035: Ru Zhonglian said: 'I will make Wei and Yan assist it, Qi, Chu then certainly assist.'
s0036: Xin Yuanjian said: 'Yan then I request follow;
s0037: If Wei, then I am Wei person, mister how can make Wei assist?'
s0038: Ru Zhonglian said: 'Wei not yet seen Qin called emperor harm therefore.
s0039: Make Wei see Qin called emperor harm, then must assist Zhao.'
s0041: Xin Yuanjian said: 'Qin called emperor harm how?'
s0042: Ru Zhonglian said: 'Formerly Qi Wei Wang once did benevolence righteousness, led world feudal lords court Zhou.
s0043: Zhou poor and small, feudal lords none court, Qi alone court it.
s0044: Dwell year plus, Zhou Lie Wang collapsed, Qi later went, Zhou angered, announced Qi: 'Heaven collapse earth split, emperor descends mat.
s0045: East fief ministers because Qi late arrive, then behead.'
s0046: Qi Wei Wang suddenly angered said: 'Scold, your mother concubine!'
s0048: Thus alive then court Zhou, dead then scold it, truly not bear its demands.
s0049: That emperor certainly so, its nothing strange.'
s0051: Xin Yuanjian said: 'Mister alone not see those servants?
s0052: Ten people from one person, rather strength not win intelligence not equal?
